title: Did he force the National Guard soldiers to sleep in a parking garage?
subtitle: Thousands of soldiers were in Washington, D.C., during Bayden's installation to secure the area after a riot in January 6 in the Capitol.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: Hundreds of members of the National Guard were forced to evacuate the American Capitol and were sent to rest in a nearby parking garage while providing security around the installation of US President Joe Biden.
